ServerConfiguration.// ListenIP: Listening IP address for the asset server, default is '*' which represents all IPv4 and IPv6 addresses
ServerConfiguration.// Port: Listening port number for the MMO server
ServerConfiguration.// EnableChat: When true, in-game chat will be enabled
ServerConfiguration.// FirstEventTimer: time to start of first world event (battle ship event) after start MMO server
ServerConfiguration.// EventTimer: time between start of world events (battle ship events)
ServerConfiguration.// RacingMaxPlayers: maximum players allowed in Thunder Run Racing (no more than 6)
ServerConfiguration.// RacingMinPlayers: minimum players to start Thunder Run Racing
